description: Unify the floating Node Config and Test Result drawers into a single, resizable sidebar within the Visual Editor.

tasks.task: Create `NodeInspector` component in `apps/web/components/routines/routine-editor/node-inspector.tsx` that supports Tabs (Configuration, Results).
Refactor `VisualEditor` to use `ResizablePanelGroup` from `@kianax/ui` for a split-pane layout (Canvas | Sidebar).
Migrate `NodeConfigDrawer` logic (forms, inputs, credential selection) into `NodeInspector`.
Migrate `TestResultDrawer` logic (status badges, output JSON, error display) into `NodeInspector`.
Update `VisualEditor` state management to control the sidebar visibility based on `configuringNodeId` or `selectedResultNodeId`.
